item.description:
Want to find simple way to learn chinese or english??? Learning name of animal in chinese is easy!!!!!!!!!!! Want to enjoy summer activity? Take your family come to visit those animals. Since they are all wake up now getting know them as much as we can. is that fun?? ^&^

I will wait outside the gate with sign till 10:45am.

For Zoo Info. http://216.235.203.12...



You're making a difference!

Do you know that just by visiting the Zoos, you are making a direct contribution to help ensure a better future for wildlife? Zoo New England dedicates twenty-five cents of each admission and $5 of every membership to support its far-reaching and effective conservation programs. We are proud of the role we play in vital conservation efforts both locally and globally. With your help, we are able to have an even greater impact and make a lasting difference!

General Admission

Adults: $10.00
Discounted Senior Admission (62+): $8.00

Discounted Child Admission (ages 2-12):
$6.00
Children under 2: Free
Members: Free
item.how_to_find_us: I will wait in front gate with sign.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Trip to Stone Zoo ( Easy Way To Learn Chinese and English)
